form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR PERMIT TO RE-ENTER THE UNITED STATES, FORM 1-131 ( (Rev. 7-1-71)N

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/13/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Immigration and Naturalization Service Form approved. OMB No. 43-R0052. A RE-ENTRY PERMIT DOES NOT PROTECT NATURALIZA. FEE STAMP TION RESIDENCE. SEE INSTRUCTIONS ATTACHED FOR INFORMATION CONCERNING EFFECT OF ABSENCE ON ELIGIBILITY FOR NATURALIZATION READ THIS FORM Bos 043192(m) AND ATTACHED INSTRUCTIONS CAREFULLY BEFORE FILLING IN THIS APPLICATION. APPLICATION FOR PERMIT TO RE-ENTER THE UNITED STATES as provided in section 223 of the Immigration and Nationality Act. (Fill in with typewriter or print in block letters in ink.) IMPORTANT: You must submit your Alien Registration Receipt Card with this application. 1. NAME (First Name) (Middle Name) (Family Name) ALIEN REGISTRATION NUMBER Mohanlal Prabhuji Trivedi A. 19 509 771 ADDRESS (Number) (Street) (City/Town) (State) (Zip Code) 215 Saffron Circle Springfield Mass. 01129 DATE OF BIRTH (Month, Day, Year) COUNTRY OF BIRTH COUNTRY OF NATIONALITY COLOR OF EYES COLOR OF HAIR 11-17-1906 India India Dark Brown Blk. &White HEIGHT VISIBLE MARKS AND SCARS 5 FEET 3 INCHES Tatoo Mark on Right Hand 2. FILL IN THE ITEMS IN THIS BLOCK ONLY IF YOU HAVE PREVIOUSLY OBTAINED A PERMIT TO RE-ENTER. ISSUANCE DATE OF LAST PERMIT LOCATION OF IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION OFFICE ISSUING MY LAST PERMIT LAST PERMIT IS ATTACHED (City and State) IS NOT ATTACHED IF THE PERMIT IS NOT ATTACHED, STATE REASON: 3. FILL IN THE ITEMS IN THIS BLOCK AS TO first ARRIVAL IN UNITED STATES FOR PERMANENT RESIDENCE NAME UNDER WHICH ADMITTED PORT OF ARRIVAL DATE OF ARRIVAL Mohanlal Prabhuji Trivedi New York City 12-20-70 FATHER'S NAME AT TIME OF YOUR ARRIVAL MOTHER'S MAIDEN NAME Prabhuji Bhagwanji Trivedi Zaver Prabhuji MEANS OF CONVEYANCE AND NAME OF TRANSPORTATION COMPANY IF ARRIVAL WAS BY VESSEL, GIVE NAME OF VESSEL Panam 4. FILL IN THE ITEMS IN THIS BLOCK AS TO last ARRIVAL IN UNITED STATES. (Exclude any re-entry after an absence of less Then six months in Canada or Mexico.) (For 2 weeks vacation - Visitor Visa ) NAME UNDER WHICH ADMITTED PORT OF ARRIVAL DATE OF ARRIVAL Mohanlal Prabhuji New York City May/June 1966 MEANS OF CONVEYANCE AND NAME OF TRANSPORTATION COMPANY IF ARRIVAL WAS BY VESSEL, GIVE NAME OF VESSEL a 5. PORT OF proposed DEPARTURE FROM UNITED STATES DATE OF proposed DEPARTURE LENGTH OF INTENDED ABSENCE ABROAD New York City October 30, 1972 One Year NAME OF TRANSPORTATION COMPANY IF DEPARTURE IS TO BE BY VESSEL, GIVE NAME OF VESSEL By Air MAILING ADDRESS ABROAD (Number and Street) (City/Town) (State/Province/District) (Country) 7 Gujarat Siddharth Society, Nr. Polytechnic, Ahmedbad 15, India COUNTRIES TO BE VISITED (List each country) India REASONS FOR GOING ABROAD (Be concise and complete): 1972 Vacation and visit relatives 6. I DID DID NOT REGISTER FOR SELECTIVE SERVICE 7. PRESENT OCCUPATION SOCIAL SECURITY ACCOUNT NUMBER Retired NAME OF EMPLOYER ADDRESS OF EMPLOYER 8. I have have not engaged in business or employment outside the United States since I became a permanent resident of the United States. (If you have engaged therein, briefly describe and show periods of such employment or business activity.) FORM 1-131 (Rev. 7-1-71)N OCT RECEIVED 25/72 TRANS. IN RET'D-TRANS. OUT COMPLETED
